edu.rit.pj2

Interface Rule.Matcher

  • Enclosing class:
    Rule

    public static interface Rule.Matcher
    Interface Rule.Matcher specifies the interface for an object that matches an on-demand Rule's templates against the tuples in tuple space.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void match(TupleSpace.Transaction transaction, AList<Tuple> templates)
      Determine if the tuples in tuple space match the given templates.

    • Method Detail

      • match

        void match(TupleSpace.Transaction transaction,
         AList<Tuple> templates)
        Determine if the tuples in tuple space match the given templates. The templates are the firing conditions for an on-demand Rule. The given Transaction is used to find and remove matching tuples from tuple space. If the match succeeds, the transaction must be committed; if the match fails, the transaction must be aborted.

        Warning: The match() method must not alter the templates list or any of its elements.

        Parameters:
        transaction - Tuple space transaction.
        templates - List of templates.
